2006-06-14

Camera Obscura


img_3853
(originally uploaded by acb)

Finally have my paws on the new Camera Obscura - and very lovely it is too. I had an email from Elefant Records proudly puffing the band's MySpace page and the fact that they were a MySpace featured band.

There's a nice Camera Obscura website and the Elefant and Merge sites have lots of info and a few goodies (including the video for "Lloyd...") so you really shouldn't have to visit the vile MySpace - I try not too.
